profiles.name: Aarav Patel
profiles.bio: Family-oriented and career-focused. Looking for a kind and understanding partner.
profiles.full_bio: I work as a software engineer and value honesty, family bonding, and balanced growth in life. I enjoy weekend travel, fitness, and meaningful conversations. Looking for a supportive partner with shared values and mutual respect.
profiles.partner_preference: Looking for an educated, family-oriented partner between 24-29 years with positive outlook and respect for elders.

profiles.name: Ishita Shah
profiles.bio: Balanced lifestyle with strong family values and interest in travel and reading.
profiles.full_bio: I am a chartered accountant with a practical and positive mindset. I strongly believe in family values and a respectful partnership. I enjoy reading, traveling, and participating in cultural activities.
profiles.partner_preference: Seeking a well-settled, caring partner with good values and understanding nature.

profiles.name: Kunal Mehta
profiles.bio: Positive outlook and responsible nature. Seeks companionship with mutual respect.
profiles.full_bio: I run a family business and lead a disciplined lifestyle. I value maturity, trust, and understanding in a relationship. I am looking to start a meaningful new chapter with a compatible partner.
profiles.partner_preference: Looking for a mature and supportive partner with emotional compatibility.

profiles.name: Neha Desai
profiles.bio: Simple, respectful, and values emotional compatibility and family bonding.
profiles.full_bio: I work as a teacher and enjoy a calm, structured lifestyle. Emotional compatibility, communication, and family support are very important to me. I prefer a caring and understanding life partner.
profiles.partner_preference: Prefer a family-centered partner with stable career and caring nature.

profiles.name: Rohan Trivedi
profiles.bio: Mature and grounded personality looking for a caring life partner.
profiles.full_bio: I am a bank manager with stable career and values rooted in family and responsibility. I am calm, practical, and respectful in nature. Looking for companionship based on trust and long-term commitment.
profiles.partner_preference: Looking for a compassionate and understanding partner for a long-term relationship.

profiles.name: Priya Nair
profiles.bio: Warm and practical. Enjoys community work and spending time with family.
profiles.full_bio: I am an HR manager and enjoy building meaningful relationships both professionally and personally. I value empathy, communication, and respect. I seek a kind, grounded partner with a positive outlook.
profiles.partner_preference: Looking for a respectful, professionally stable partner with open-minded family values.

profiles.name: Siddharth Jain
profiles.bio: Compassionate and disciplined, interested in meaningful conversations and growth.
profiles.full_bio: As a doctor, I live a disciplined and purpose-driven life. I value compassion, humility, and emotional maturity. Looking for a partner who believes in mutual support, family values, and personal growth.
profiles.partner_preference: Prefer an educated and calm partner who values family and emotional maturity.

profiles.name: Riddhi Bhatt
profiles.bio: Calm and creative person who values trust, kindness, and shared life goals.
profiles.full_bio: I am an architect with a creative mindset and balanced lifestyle. I value kindness, transparency, and emotional strength in a relationship. I am looking for a respectful and supportive companion for the future.
profiles.partner_preference: Seeking a kind, emotionally mature partner with stable professional background.
